author: radekkapka
content: When considering Electra updates, we missed https://ethereum.github.io/beacon-APIs/?urls.primaryName=dev#/Validator/produceAttestationData. It currently has a required `committee_index` parameter which should not be present at all post-Electra

author: radekkapka
content: It probably needs a bump to `v2`

author: radekkapka
content: We can also make it non-mandatory, keep the `v1` version and ignore the value post-Electra

author: radekkapka
content: Changing from mandatory to non-mandatory is not a breaking change

author: nflaig
content: but if a client suddenly stop sending it and the server still has it set as required this will result in an error

author: nflaig
content: even pre-electra, this was just passed through and not really used, could use this opportunity to clean up the api by bumping to v2
